sentences.sentence: Love was poetically compared to flower.
sentences.translation: 爱情在诗歌中被比作花朵。

sentences.sentence: I blew the whistle of my life poetically.
sentences.translation: 我把生命的哨子诗意地吹响。

sentences.sentence: At a time when I tired to stop dwelling poetically.
sentences.translation: 在我疲倦的时候可以停下来诗意地栖居。
